fullplot: Inspired by a true story of a young Hasidic man who was lured into the world of international drug trafficking in the late 90s.
plot: In Brooklyn, a youth from an Orthodox Jewish community is lured into becoming an Ecstasy dealer by his pal who has ties to an Israeli drug cartel.
title: Holy Rollers

tomatoes.consensus: Despite a promising premise and a solid central performance from Jesse Eisenberg, Holy Rollers lacks the depth necessary to overcome its cliched script.
